ca.ualberta.CMPUT301W15T06

Class ClaimantDeleteItemController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.CMPUT301W15T06.ClaimantDeleteItemController

  • public class ClaimantDeleteItemController
extends java.lang.Object
    This ClaimantDeleteItemController class controls the action of ItemList and Claim for claimant. This controller class will remove a Item from ItemList in the Claim.
    Version:
    04/07/2015
    Author:
    CMPUT301W15T06
